titleStmt.title: A lamentation in vvhiche is shevved what ruyne and destruction cometh of seditious rebellyon
titleStmt.author: Morison, Richard, Sir, d. 1556.
Cheke, John, Sir, 1514-1557, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris],

notesStmt.note: Erroneously attributed to Sir John Cheke.
Printer's name and place of publication from colophon.
Identified as STC 15185 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
